name: Wild Gorilla Sim
description:
Battle against Tigers, Elephants, Zebra, Scorpions, and Cheetah. Help him grow from a weak gorilla into a strong Silver back. Hunt down your natural enemies. Super fun animal simulation that we hope you find entertaining.

Features:
- Stunning action packed missions in gorilla fighting games.
- Realistic Gorilla games play in big city.
- Realistic horror and thrilling gorilla sound.
- Awesome 3D graphics
